scripts.deploy:bscmain: npm run set:bscmain && truffle migrate --network bscmain
scripts.deploy:bsctest: npm run set:bsctest && truffle migrate --network bsctest
scripts.source: truffle-flattener contracts/*.sol | sed '/^.*SPDX-License-Identifier:.*$/d' | sed '1s/^/\/\/ SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-only\n\n/' > Contracts.sol
scripts.test:bscmain: GAS_LIMIT=30000000 npm run set:bscmain && truffle test
scripts.test:bsctest: GAS_LIMIT=30000000 npm run set:bsctest && truffle test
